name: cloudflare-email-ai-worker
description: AI-powered email auto-reply system using Cloudflare Workers

scripts.setup-db: wrangler d1 execute email-ai-db --command="CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS conversations (id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, email TEXT NOT NULL, content TEXT NOT NULL, response TEXT NOT NULL, created_at TEXT NOT NULL); CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS idx_email_date ON conversations(email, created_at);"
